title: Absinthe Cocktail
directions: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain

title: Four Score
directions: Stir together with ice, strain into glass, garnish with a twisted lemon rind

title: Golden Doublet
directions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into champagne cocktail glass, and fill with champagne.

title: Black Velvet
directions: fill a tall champagne flute, halfway with chilled sparkling wine and float stout beer on top of the wine

title: B and B
directions: Combine and stir

title: Absinthe And Egg
directions: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain

title: Dry Martini
directions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

title: Bijou
directions: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

title: Caipirinha
directions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaça.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Gibson
directions: Stir well in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish and serve

title: Batida
directions: Mix and pour into chilled glass.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: The Blenheim
directions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Churchill
directions: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.

title: Grumpy Garcia
directions: Shake and strain the infused Tito's Handmade Vodka, Cointreau, lime juice and pomegranate juice Shake and strain

title: Black and Tan
directions: Pale ale or lager and stout or porter

title: Long Island Iced Tea
directions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Screwdriver
directions: Mix in a highball glass with ice, Garnish and serve
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Black Russian
directions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Brave Bull
directions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Pour 1½ oz tequila and 1/2 oz Kahlúa. Serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Dirty Mother
directions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Pour 1½ oz brandy and 1/2 oz Kahlúa. Serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Espresso Martini
directions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

title: Yellow Bird
directions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

title: Dry Martini
directions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

title: Vesper
directions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

title: Pisco sour
directions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.

title: Dark 'N' Stormy
directions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Lemon Drop Martini
directions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

title: Bramble
directions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

title: Margarita
directions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

title: Kamikaze
directions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

title: Spritz Veneziano
directions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: French Martini
directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

title: B-52
directions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

title: Tequila Sunrise
directions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: The Godfather
directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: French Connection
directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Sex on the Beach
directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Sea Breeze
directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice

title: Rose
directions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

title: Pina colada
directions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
